reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com/admin/modules'.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com/#overlay=admin/modules'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Enter 'Sticky Edit Actions' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Sticky Edit Actions' to be visible in module list.
Enter 'Devel' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Devel' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Devel' check box is checked.
Enter 'Acquia Purge' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Acquia Purge' to be visible in module list.
Enter 'ImageField Focus' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'ImageField Focus' to be visible in module list.
Enter 'Database logging' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Database logging' to be visible in module list.
Enter 'Pub Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Pub Post' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Pub Post' check box is checked.
Enter 'Logo Manager' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'Logo Manager' to be visible in module list.
Verify the 'Logo Manager' check box is checked.
Enter 'MPS' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for module filter titled 'MPS' to be visible in module list.
Click the 'Uninstall' overlay tab.
Scroll by '-500'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'MPS' uninstall checkbox.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Modules dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Add content' menu link.
Click the 'Post' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Verify the 'Title' is present as a required field.
Verify the 'Body' is present as a required field.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Verify the 'Moderation State' is present as a required field.
Scroll to and click the 'Basic Information' tab.
Enter 'futurePost08/08/2014d06852c0c2fa4d5' in the 'Title' text box.
Switch to the Synopsis frame.
Enter a randomized text string into the 'Body' text area.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Click the 'Cover' select button.
Switch to the select file frame.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Click the 'Next' button.
Click the 'Public Local Files' radio button.
Click the 'Next' button.
Verify the file image 'HanSolo' is present.
Verify the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Create Post dialog'.
Scroll the 'Publishing Options' link into view.
Click the 'Publishing Options' link.
Select 'Draft' from the 'Moderation State' drop down list.
Click the 'Save' button.
Verify success message of 'Post futurePost08/08/2014d06852c0c2fa4d5 has been created.' is present.
Click the 'Schedule' link in the work bench.
Switch to the active frame titled 'futurePost08/08/2014d06852c0c2fa4d5 dialog'.
Click the 'Add Scheduled Revision' link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'futurePost08/08/2014d06852c0c2fa4d5 dialog'.
Select revision titled 'futurePost08/08/2014d06852c0c2fa4d5'.
Verify that the 'Operation' option count equals '5'.
Select 'Moderate to Published' from the 'Select operation' drop down list.
Enter '08/08/2014' in the 'Date' text box.
Enter '12:00 PM' in the 'Time' text box.
Click the 'Schedule' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'futurePost08/08/2014d06852c0c2fa4d5 dialog'.
Verify success message of 'The scheduled revision operation has been saved' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com/#overlay=admin/content/logos'.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Manage Logo dialog'.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Logos' menu link.
Click the 'Add Logo' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Add Logo dialog'.
Enter 'cb80c2315ac9400' in the 'Title' text box.
Enter the file path for file upload.
Click the 'Upload' button.
Wait for the file link to be visible after upload.
Verify the file image 'nbclogosmall' is present.
Verify the the img is loaded and visible.
Enter '2014-08-08' in the 'Start Date' text box.
Enter '12:00:35 PM' in the 'Start Time' text box.
Enter '2014-08-08' in the 'End Date' text box.
Enter '01:55:35 PM' in the 'End Time' text box.
Click the 'Save' button.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Manage Logo dialog'.
Verify the text 'cb80c2315ac9400' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Fri, 08/08/2014 - 12:00' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Fri, 08/08/2014 - 13:55' is present on the page.
Assert the file image 'nbclogosmall' is present.
Assert the the img is loaded and visible.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
Check if the 'Connect to MPX' button is present. If not then MPX has not been previously enabled.
Enter mpx username in the 'Username for New Account' text box.
Enter mpx password in the 'Password for New Account' text box.
Click the 'Connect to MPX' button.
Select 'DB TV' from the first 'Select Import Account for...' drop down list.
click the 'Set Import Account' button.
Uncheck the 'Sync mpxMedia on Cron' check box.
Click the 'Save configurations' button.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
Scroll by '-500'.
Mouse over the 'Content' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Files' menu link.
Click the 'mpxMedia' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Content dialog'.
Select 'AutomationPlayer1' from the first 'Import Player' drop down list.
Click the 'Sync MPX Media Now' link.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.

Switch to the active frame titled 'Status report dialog'.
